item.title: Back to Black: Remembering Metallica's 'Black Album,' 25 Years Later
item.description:
Back to Black: Remembering Metallica's 'Black Album,' 25 Years Later

Twenty-five years after the release of "The Black Album," Metallica are still struggling to recapture lightning in a bottle. For the first seven years of their career, Metallica's main objective was to be the loudest, heaviest, fastest, and most mind-blowing band on the planet.

item.title: All you need to know about when to buy your Guns N' Roses Australian tour tickets
item.description:
All you need to know about when to buy your Guns N' Roses Australian tour tickets

It's official - Guns N' Roses are touring Australia in February. And it's more than half of the real Guns N' Roses, after Axl, Slash and Duff McKagan got back together and on the road in the US this year.

item.title: Zakk Wylde: "Guns N' Roses Are the Zeppelin of Our Generation"
item.description:
Zakk Wylde: "Guns N' Roses Are the Zeppelin of Our Generation"

Over the past few decades, Zakk Wylde has somehow mastered the art of being one of the most influential modern guitarists of our time, but still staying under the radar. And while he isn't one to start many debates, this interview made it clear that, once he gets started on...

item.title: Ronnie James Dio Hologram Debuts at German Metal Festival
item.description:
Ronnie James Dio Hologram Debuts at German Metal Festival

The fervent Ronnie James Dio fans who gathered to watch a group of the late singer's former bandmates close out Germany's mega-sized heavy-metal festival Wacken Open Air Saturday night got a big surprise: a theatrical performance by Dio in hologram form.

item.title: Megadeth - Poisonous Shadows (Live) (360)
item.description:
Megadeth - Poisonous Shadows (Live) (360)

Get a 360 view of the band performing "Poisonous Shadows" from their Virtual Reality experience for new album 'Dystopia.'

item.title: Confirmed: Guns N' Roses Are Bringing Their Tour Down Under
item.description:
Confirmed: Guns N' Roses Are Bringing Their Tour Down Under

Fans can officially start their countdown as the dates for the Australian leg of Guns N' Roses Not In This Lifetime tour were announced on Wednesday morning. Paul Dainty, president and CEO of music promoter TEG Dainty confirmed the news in a statement, revealing founder Axl Rose and former members, Slash and Duff McKagan who are currently completing the U.S.

item.title: Ozzy Osbourne: Led Zeppelin Trial Was 'Waste of Fucking Time'
item.description:
Ozzy Osbourne: Led Zeppelin Trial Was 'Waste of Fucking Time'

Ozzy Osbourne weighs in on last month's Led Zeppelin trial, calling it a waste of time.

item.title: Kendrick, Rihanna, Metallica Set for Global Citizen Festival
item.description:
Kendrick, Rihanna, Metallica Set for Global Citizen Festival

On September 24, the 2016 Global Citizen Festival will be held in Central Park in Manhattan. Rihanna, Kendrick Lamar, Major Lazer, Metallica, and Selena Gomez are set to headline. Special guests include festival curator Chris Martin of Coldplay, Eddie Vedder, Usher, Ellie Goulding, Yusuf/Cat Stevens, and Yandel.

item.title: Guns N' Roses 'Not in This Lifetime' Tour Among Top-Priced Summer Tickets
item.description:
Guns N' Roses 'Not in This Lifetime' Tour Among Top-Priced Summer Tickets

Guns N' Roses have just a few weeks left of their Not In This Lifetime headlining reunion tour, and tickets remain some of the most competitively priced of the summer. Their North American trek began back in June, and will continue to run throughout August where it'll wrap up at San Diego.

item.title: Red Hot Chili Peppers - Dark Necessities [OFFICIAL VIDEO]
item.description:
Red Hot Chili Peppers - Dark Necessities [OFFICIAL VIDEO]

Watch the music video for "Dark Necessities" now!
